shoutOut.title: Hi I'm David!
shoutOut.description: I am curious about your ideas, projects and challanges. Since my study is empowering me to make software in all different ways I always try to improve my personal workflow and solve daily problems. Despite my tech-hobbies I love running, traveling and being part of social projects. I'm always in search for the most promising and productive approach to achieve my goals.
